item.title: Hydrangea
item.description:
20190614-Hydrangea
下载此壁纸（1920x1080）

Today is 'Irume'. The actual rainy season will be announced by the Japan Meteorological Agency, but it is the day when it is considered to be rainy on the calendar. Speaking of flowers in the rainy season, hydrangea. We dye the melancholy season with bright colors...
